contentrichtext.text: {{pp-move-indef}} {{wiktionary|fool}} {{wikiquote|Fools}} '''Fool''', '''The Fool''', or '''Fools''' may refer to: * A [[jester]], a [[clown]], a [[harlequin]], a [[bouffon]] * [[Foolishness]], the quality of having poor judgement or little intelligence ==Culture== * [[The Fool (Tarot card)]], a Tarot card * [[The Fool (design collective)]], a Dutch design collective and band influential in the psychedelic style of art in the 1960s ** ''The Fool'', 1968 album released by The Fool ** [[The Fool (guitar)]], 1964 Gibson SG designed by The Fool for Eric Clapton ==Finance== * [[The Motley Fool]], a stocks and financial advice website (''fool.com'') nicknamed 'the Fool' ==Food== * [[Fruit fool]], a dish made with cooked fruit * [[Ful medames]] (variant spelling) ==Literature== * [[Shakespearean fool]], an archetypal character in numerous works by Shakespeare * [[The Fool (fictional character)]], a fictional character in ''The Realm of the Elderlings'' by Robin Hobb * [[Fools (play)|''Fools'' (play)]], a 1981 play by Neil Simon * [[Fool (novel)|''Fool'' (novel)]], a 2009 novel by Christopher Moore * [[The Fool (Edward Bond play)|''The Fool'' (Edward Bond play)]], a 1975 play by the English playwright Edward Bond ==Movie== * [[The Fool (film)|''The Fool'' (film)]], a 1990 British film * [[Fools (film)|''Fools'' (film)]], a 1970 American film * [[Fools (2003 film)|''Fools'' (2003 film)]], a 2003 Indian film directed by [[Dasari Narayana Rao]] ==Music== ;Songs * [[The Fool (Lee Ann Womack song)|"The Fool" (Lee Ann Womack song)]] * "The Fool", 1971 hit single by [[Gilbert MontagnÃ©]] * "The Fool", 1956 hit single by [[Sanford Clark]], written by Lee Hazlewood, recorded by Elvis Presley, Chris Farlowe a.o. * "Fool", song by Shakira from ''[[Laundry Service]]'' * "Fool", song by Cat Power from ''[[You Are Free]]'' * "The Fool", song by Neutral Milk Hotel, from ''[[In the Aeroplane Over the Sea]]'' * "The Fool", song by The Fixx from ''[[Shuttered Room]]'' * "The Fool", song by Quicksilver Messenger Service from ''[[Quicksilver Messenger Service (album)|Quicksilver Messenger Service]]'' * "Fool", song by The Rasmus from ''[[Peep (album)|Peep]]'' * "Fool", song by Roxette from ''[[Room Service (Roxette album)|Room Service]]'' * "Fools", a song by Deep Purple from ''[[Fireball (album)|Fireball]]'' ;Albums * ''The Fool'', a 2005 album by [[Esoterica (band)|Esoterica]] * [[The Fool (Warpaint album)|''The Fool'' (Warpaint album)]], 2010 * [[The Fool (EP)|''The Fool'' (EP)]], a 2007 collaboration EP by Noah23 and Lord Kufu ;Other * [[The Fools]], a musical group from Massachusetts ==See also== * [[Folly (disambiguation)]] * [[Foolish (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
